metadata.note: Some quotes appear in multiple categories

quotes.text: Children are not things to be molded, but are people to be unfolded.
quotes.author: Jess Lair

quotes.text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.source: Seven Strategies for Wealth and Happiness

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation.
quotes.author: Glenn Close

quotes.text: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.text: Your future depends on many things, but mostly on you.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.text: The first wealth is health.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: The difference between try and triumph is just a little umph!
quotes.author: Marvin Phillips

quotes.text: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Health is not valued until sickness comes.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Your children will become what you are; so be what you want them to be.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.text: Mental health needs to be talked about like physical health.
quotes.author: Prince Harry

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Your body is a reflection of your lifestyle.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.text: The most important thing in illness is never to lose heart.
quotes.author: Nikolai Lenin

quotes.text: A child's mental health is just as important as their physical health.
quotes.author: Kate Middleton

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Mindfulness isn't difficult. We just need to remember to do it.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.text: Parents need to fill a child's bucket of self-esteem so high that the rest of the world can't poke enough holes to drain it dry.
quotes.author: Alvin Price

quotes.text: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.text: The greatest wealth is health.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.text: Children are not things to be molded, but are people to be unfolded.
quotes.author: Jess Lair

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Every child is gifted. They just unwrap their packages at different times.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.text: The greatest discovery of my generation is that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Take care of your mind, your body will thank you. Take care of your body, your mind will thank you.
quotes.author: Debbie Hampton

quotes.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The greatest happiness is family happiness.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers
quotes.source: What Every Woman Should Know About Men

quotes.text: Health is a relationship between you and your body.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.text: You don't have to be extreme, just consistent.
quotes.author: Chalene Johnson

quotes.text: The way we talk to our children becomes their inner voice.
quotes.author: Peggy O'Mara

quotes.text: Wellness is the complete integration of body, mind, and spirit.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.text: What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: Behind every child who believes in himself is a parent who believed first.
quotes.author: Matthew L. Jacobson

quotes.text: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.text: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your mind will quit a thousand times before your body will.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Children are made readers on the laps of their parents.
quotes.author: Emilie Buchwald

quotes.text: Happiness is the highest form of health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
quotes.author: Bill Phillips

quotes.text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.text: It's not about perfect. It's about effort.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.text: The most important work you will ever do will be within the walls of your own home.
quotes.author: Harold B. Lee

quotes.text: Meditation is not a way of making your mind quiet. It is a way of entering into the quiet that is already there.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra
quotes.source: The Seven Spiritual Laws of Success

quotes.text: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.text: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Listen to your body. It's smarter than you are.
quotes.author: Dr. Andrew Weil

quotes.text: The time spent on family is not a sacrifice. It's an investment.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey
quotes.source: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People

quotes.text: Your body can stand almost anything. It's your mind that you have to convince.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.text: The greatest force in the human body is the natural drive to heal itself.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.text: Don't raise your kids to have more than you had, raise them to be more than you were.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The quality of your sleep determines the quality of your wake.
quotes.author: Matthew Walker

quotes.text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Mental health is not a destination, but a process. It's about how you drive, not where you're going.
quotes.author: Noam Shpancer

quotes.text: The best project you'll ever work on is you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought - they must be earned.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.text: Your children will become what you are; so be what you want them to be.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Wellness is the natural state of my body. I trust in its wisdom.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.text: The greatest wealth is health.
quotes.author: Virgil
